page.shortlink: api pdf export jpg function source
page.description: Exports a PDF file as a JPG file. This is useful for converting a PDF file into a JPG file. If the PDF file has multiple pages then one .jpg file is created for each page.
page.syntax: L flag = Pdf_exportJPG(c file, c result_file , c resolution)

argument.name: result_File
argument.description: Character. name of the .jpg file to create.
